#labels OCR,LSTM
= Ocrocis =

A project manager for Thomas Breuel's Ocropy toolkit for training optical character recognition (OCR) models with long short term memory networks (https://github.com/tmbdev/ocropy).

Ocrocis guides the user in training high-quality OCR models from raw PDFs or images. It features automatic project management and a minimalistic interface.

Please see the official readme at http://cistern.cis.lmu.de/ocrocis

Download the application from http://cistern.cis.lmu.de/ocrocis.tar.gz
